greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Absolute difference of numerator and denominator of Bernoulli(2*n), n >= 0.
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..310
maple: A000367 := proc(n) numer(bernoulli(2*n)) ; end: A002445 := proc(n) denom(bernoulli(2*n)) ; end: A162173 := proc(n) abs( A000367(n)-A002445(n)) ; end: seq(A162173(n),n=0..40) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 13 2009
mathematica: a[n_] := Abs[Numerator[BernoulliB[2n]] - Denominator[BernoulliB[2n]]]; Array[a, 20, 0] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 25 2018 *)
results.author: _Juri-Stepan Gerasimov_, Jun 27 2009
ext: a(15) and a(16) corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 13 2009
